        Token to process

      • getCountersForService

        java.util.List<Counter> getCountersForService(java.lang.Integer branchId,
                                              java.lang.Integer serviceId,
                                              CustomerType customerType)
        Gets the counters of branch serving the particular service
        Parameters:
        branchId - branch identifier
        serviceId - service identifer
        customerType - type of customer(REGULAR,PRIORITY)
        Returns:
        branch with counter added
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - when branch does not exist or counter with passed id is not present in branch

        counterNumber - counter identifier
        Returns:

        Throws:
